original_title: Es Stirbt Allerdings Ein Jeder Frage ist Nur Wie Und Wie du Gelebt Hast
overview: A look into the life of Holger Meins, the German cinematography student who became a revolutionary and a prominent voice in the Vietnam War protest movement. This film is comprised of interviews with his associates.  16mm, color & b/w
title: We All Die, the Main Thing However is How and How We Live Our LivesÂ
